channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Power Management Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Power Management Driver

item.title: CVE-2017-3741|2024-08-05T14:39:40.937Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- power%20management%20driver
item.description: In the Lenovo Power Management driver before 1.67.12.24, a local user may alter the trackpoint's firmware and stop the trackpoint from functioning correctly. This issue only affects ThinkPad X1 Carbon 5th generation.
